panel.test: This string is translated via the plugin API

iconColor.desc: Color for the icon when IP is successfully fetched
iconColor.label: Icon Color

successIcon.desc: Icon to show when IP is successfully fetched
successIcon.label: Success Icon

errorIcon.desc: Icon to show when IP fetch fails
errorIcon.label: Error Icon

loadingIcon.desc: Icon to show while fetching IP
loadingIcon.label: Loading Icon

refreshInterval.desc: How often to automatically refresh IP info. Set to 0 to disable auto-refresh.
refreshInterval.label: Auto-refresh Interval (seconds)
